metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6270 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the ATA over Ethernet (AoE) driver in the Linux kernel.The aoecmd_cfg_pkts() function improperly updates the refcnt on `structnet_device`, and a use-after-free can be triggered by racing between thefree on the struct and the access through the `skbtxq` global queue. Thiscould lead to a denial of service condition or potential code execution.

criterions.comment: linux package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
linux-hwe-5.4 package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
